languages.text: "Можешь сам{mf||а} проверить". {n}Кибелла снимает с пояса и разворачивает небольшой кожаный сверток с орудиями для пыток.{/n}
"You can see for yourself." {n}Kibellah removes a small leather pouch from her belt and opens it to reveal several instruments of torture.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Можешь сам{mf||а} проверить". {n}Кибелла снимает с пояса и разворачивает небольшой кожаный сверток с орудиями для пыток.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "You can see for yourself." {n}Kibellah removes a leather bundle from her belt and unwraps it, revealing a set of torture instruments.{/n}
"You can see for yourself." {n}Kibellah removes a leather bundle from her belt and unwraps it, revealing a set of torture instruments.{/n}
"You can see for yourself." {n}Kibellah removes a small leather pouch from her belt and opens it to reveal several instruments of torture.{/n}

"You can see for yourself." {n}Kibellah removes a small leather pouch from her belt and opens it to reveal several instruments of torture.{/n}
"You can see for yourself." {n}Kibellah removes a small leather pouch from her belt and opens it to reveal several instruments of torture.{/n}

languages.text: «Compruébelo usted {mf|mismo|misma}». {n}Kibellah desengancha un estuche de cuero que lleva al cinto y lo despliega, revelando que contiene diversos instrumentos de tortura.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You can see for yourself." {n}Kibellah removes a small leather pouch from her belt and opens it to reveal several instruments of torture.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Compruébelo usted {mf|mismo|misma}». {n}Kibellah desengancha un estuche de cuero que lleva al cinto y lo despliega, revelando que contiene diversos instrumentos de tortura.{/n}

languages.text: 「自分で見ればいい」{n}キベラはベルトから小さな革のポーチを外して開き、いくつかの拷問道具を見せる。{/n}
languages.original_text: "You can see for yourself." {n}Kibellah removes a small leather pouch from her belt and opens it to reveal several instruments of torture.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「自分で見ればいい」{n}キベラはベルトから小さな革のポーチを外して開き、いくつかの拷問道具を見せる。{/n}

languages.text: “你可以亲自试试看。”{n}绮贝菈从腰间取下一个小皮袋，打开皮带，露出了里面的几件刑具。{/n}
languages.original_text: "You can see for yourself." {n}Kibellah removes a small leather pouch from her belt and opens it to reveal several instruments of torture.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “你可以亲自试试看。”{n}绮贝菈从腰间取下一个小皮袋，打开皮带，露出了里面的几件刑具。{/n}

languages.text: "Seht es Euch selbst an." {n}Kibellah holt einen kleinen Lederbeutel aus ihrem Gürtel hervor, öffnet ihn und offenbart mehrere Folterwerkzeuge.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You can see for yourself." {n}Kibellah removes a small leather pouch from her belt and opens it to reveal several instruments of torture.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Seht es Euch selbst an." {n}Kibellah holt einen kleinen Lederbeutel aus ihrem Gürtel hervor, öffnet ihn und offenbart mehrere Folterwerkzeuge.{/n}

languages.text: « Voyez vous-même. » {n}Kibellah ôte une petite bourse de cuir de sa ceinture et l'ouvre pour révéler plusieurs instruments de torture.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You can see for yourself." {n}Kibellah removes a small leather pouch from her belt and opens it to reveal several instruments of torture.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Voyez vous-même. » {n}Kibellah ôte une petite bourse de cuir de sa ceinture et l'ouvre pour révéler plusieurs instruments de torture.{/n}

languages.original_text: "You can see for yourself." {n}Kibellah removes a small leather pouch from her belt and opens it to reveal several instruments of torture.{/n}

languages.text: "Kendin dene de gör." {n}Kibellah, kemerinden ufak bir deri kese çıkarıyor. Açınca içinden birkaç işkence aleti çıkıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You can see for yourself." {n}Kibellah removes a small leather pouch from her belt and opens it to reveal several instruments of torture.{/n}
